DOC.brief_summary: PERMED01 is a prospective monocenter clinical trial which aims to evaluate the number patients with locally advanced or metastatic cancer for whom identification of molecular alterations in tumor samples can lead to the delivery of a targeted therapy. PERMED01 will enroll 460 patients in 3 years.
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Molecular Alterations to Guide Individualized Treatment in Advanced Solid Tumors
